snippet.title: RWBY: Arrowfell - Release Date Reveal
snippet.description:
Team RWBY is ready to go in RWBY: Arrowfell! In this all-new, canonical action-adventure game, you'll instantly switch between all four Huntresses - Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang - and use their trademark weapons and Semblances in combat and exploration! Dash and evade with Ruby's Petal Burst, create platforms with Weiss's Glyphs, make doppelgangers with Blake's Shadow, and destroy obstacles (and Grimm!) with Yang's Burn! Protect Remnant from a mysterious new threat in RWBY: Arrowfell, coming November 15, 2022, to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC! More info: https://wayforward.com/rwby-arrowfell-release-date-revealed/ 

» Get your Rooster Teeth merch: http://bit.ly/29dfbRM
» Subscribe: http://bit.ly/13y3Gum 

About Rooster Teeth:
Welcome to the Rooster Teeth Channel. We're a production company in Austin, TX, making podcasts, animated shows, and live-action shorts and series.
